column3: In order to purchase a plot of land privately, you must have at least one class at level 50.
Furthermore, you must hold a rank of second lieutenant or above in one of the Grand Companies.
At present, Shirogane is open for display only. Land sales will commence at a later time.
In order to purhase a plot in Shirogane, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Not without Incident.”
At present, Empyreum is open for display only. Land sales will commence at a later time.
In order to purchase a plot in Empyreum, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Litany of Peace.”
